text: Wendee Lee (born February 20, 1960 in Los Angeles, California) is an American voice actress. She is best known for voicing, or speaking, in many different video games, Power Rangers episodes, ADR voiceover of The Powerpuff Girls series, and dubbing, or film making, in anime. She is also a vegetarian. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Wendee Lee Interview on Anime Dream Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:American vegetarians Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Wendee Lee
